All Classes

Class Description
Card
Represents a card from the German playing cards pack.
ChannelClientHandler
A handler for each client (= another player) a server (= the main player) has and services.
ChannelGetClients
Represents a communication channel used only for initial listening on port 4444 and finding and connecting to the players willing to play a gameControllers.
ChannelSender
Represents a communication channel used only for sending String messages to a specified recipient.
GameController
Represents a Game Controller, operates based on the Finite State Machine concept.
GameControllerClientMultiplayer
Represents a Game Controller for the Person Vs Person mode from the perspective of a player playing on the device in the client role, operates based on the Finite State Machine concept.
GameControllerMultiplayer
Represents a Game Controller for the Person Vs Person mode, operates based on the Finite State Machine concept.
GameControllerServerMultiplayer
Represents a Game Controller for the Person Vs Person mode from the perspective of a player playing on the device in the server role, operates based on the Finite State Machine concept.
GameControllerVsComputer
Represents a Game Controller for the Person Vs Computer mode, operates based on the Finite State Machine concept.
GameModel
Represents model for the game play.
GameSettingsDTO
Helper Data transfer Object class for propagating information from view through controller to the model.
GameStates
Contains all the possible states of the game.
Main  
MenuController
Manages all the menu options and steps taken by the user in order to play a game.
MenuScene
Contains the possible menu scenes to be set up as the view, when the user is setting up his game.
MenuView
Generates the view for the menu part of the application based on the status of the SceneModel object managed by the MenuController.
Move
Represents a move played by a player.
MoveDTO
A helper class encompassing all the necessary data for communicating the performed moves between the players, can be used to both send through the network in the JSON format, or passed as an object directly to another player.
MoveState
Contains all the possible states of the move in a game.
MoveStateDTO
A helper class for getting data about the move states from JSON file.
MoveStateHandler  
MoveType
Contains possible types of moves a player can perform in a game.
PersonPlayer
Represents a player played by a person.
Player
Represends a general player in a card gameControllers.
RandomPlayer
Represents a random player for the mode of the gameControllers Player Vs Computer The random player can generate possible moves, evaluate them to some extend, but chooses randomly from the pool of possible moves narrowed down to the best ones.
Rank
Contains the ranks of cards in the German playing cards pack.
SceneModel
Represents a scene in the view.
SpecialCardCase  
Suit
Contains the suits of cards in the German playing cards pack.
